title: Senate deadlocked over health care spending
shortDescription: Senators are deadlocked over Medicaid cuts and ACA subsidies as a government shutdown looms.

title: Trump doubles funding for AI-enabled pediatric cancer research
shortDescription: The new executive order signed Sept. 30 infuses another $50 million into the program annually.

title: Takeaways: Hegseth rips Pentagon 'decay,' Trump threatens top brass
shortDescription: "If the words I'm speaking today are making your heart sink, then you should do the honorable thing and resign," Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth said.

title: Trump posts AI video of Hakeem Jeffries in a sombrero as shutdown looms
shortDescription: President Donald Trump posted a deepfake of Hakeem Jeffries and Chuck Schumer ahead of the government shutdown. Many call the viral video racist.

title: Judge to Trump: Foreign students have free speech rights
shortDescription: The actions by Marco Rubio and Kristi Noem were undertaken "to strike fear" into other students with similar, pro-Palestinian views, the judge found.

title: Trump calls shutdown 'likely' in health care fight with Dems: Updates
shortDescription: Trump and congressional Democrats braced for a partial shutdown of the federal government as a midnight deadline approached

title: Jeffries challenges Trump, 'Say it to my face'
shortDescription: Democratic Leader Hakeem Jeffries called out President Donald Trump for an expletive-laden, racially charged deepfake of Congress' top Democrats.

title: Trump announces drug-pricing deal with Pfizer, 'TrumpRx' website
shortDescription: President Trump announced a deal with Pfizer for the drugmaker to voluntarily sell medications through Medicaid at lower prices.

title: 'TrumpRx' unveiled, slashes drug prices
shortDescription: President Trump unveils "TrumpRx", a Pfizer partnership to cut drug costs.

title: Video shows Trump refer to racial slur in discussing nuclear threat
shortDescription: President Trump, speaking to US military leaders Sept. 30 at Quantico, referenced two 'N-words' you can't use in discussion of nuclear threat.

title: Trump refers to racial slur in speech
shortDescription: President Trump said there are “two N words” you can’t say while discussing nuclear weapons during a meeting with military leaders at Quantico.

title: Trump suggests using cities for military training
shortDescription: President Donald Trump suggested that "dangerous cities" could be used for military training purposes.

title: Trump, Hegseth target military DEI and fitness
shortDescription: President Donald Trump and Pete Hegseth vowed to fire generals and accept resignations, pushing new policies including military fitness rules.

title: Trump gives Hamas deadline to respond to Gaza peace plan
shortDescription: Trump and Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu announced the peace plan during a White House event Sept. 29.

title: Trump said 'vast numbers' of federal workers face layoffs in shutdown
shortDescription: Trump warns that 'vast numbers' of federal workers could be laid off in a government shutdown looming at midnight Sept. 30.

title: Trump threatens top brass at high-stakes military summit
shortDescription: Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth told the country's military elite new reforms would weed political correctness from the U.S. armed forces.

title: YouTube settles with Trump for $24.5M
shortDescription: YouTube pays $24.5M to settle lawsuit after suspending Trump’s account post-Jan. 6 riots.
